A cheap door t' secure yer base. Its vulnerability t' fire 'n weak explosive resistance makes th' door a temporary solution t' securin' yer base. Due t' its flaws ye should look at upgradin' t' a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

Th' Wooden Door can loot two kinds o' locks th' basic Key Lock 'n th' Code Lock. T' pick up th' door, scuttle any locks 'n open, hold down th' E (USE) key 'n select 'Pickup'.

engineitem_tier_desc: Engine items of higher tiers have a greater effect when used in an engine
excavator_target_hqm_desc: Scan for and mine HQM ore
excavator_target_metal_desc: Scan for and mine Metal ore
excavator_target_sulfur_desc: Scan for and mine Sulfur ore
experimentcost_desc: Scrap required to conduct an experiment
explosive.satchel.desc: Blastin' charge for blowin' away wooden and shite metal doors!
explosive.timed.desc: Useful for breaking into other ships.
extinguish_campfire_desc: Put th' fire out. Grub gunna stop cookin'.
falloffdesc: Distance until the projectile loses velocity and deals less damage
fat.animal.desc: Cutted up from ye land animals
fertilizer.desc: Helps plants grow by increasing ground condition. Produced in a composter.
find_player_desc: Who do ye wants t' kick from ship?
fireplace.stone.desc: A stone fireplace to heat your home. Must be placed indoors and against a wall.
fireratedesc: How much this modification affects a weapons rate of fire
firework.boomer.blue.desc: A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst
firework.boomer.champagne.desc: A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts
firework.boomer.green.desc: A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst
firework.boomer.orange.desc: A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst
firework.boomer.red.desc: A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst
firework.boomer.violet.desc: A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst
firework.romancandle.blue.desc: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air
firework.romancandle.green.desc: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air
firework.romancandle.red.desc: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air
firework.romancandle.violet.desc: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air
firework.volcano.desc: Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks
firework.volcano.red.desc: Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks
firework.volcano.violet.desc: Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks
fish.cooked.desc: Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
fishingrod.handmade.desc: Use [+attack2] to cast out the line and wait for a bite. Requires bait.
fishingrod.handmade.name: Handmade Fishing Rod
fishtrap.small.desc: Traps fish, place on the shore and load with bait. The more bait loaded the bigger the chance of catching Trout.
flamethrower.desc: A Thrower O' Fire from the future. Use low grade oil to fuel the weapon.
flameturret.desc: Automated Flame turret. Requires Low Grade Fuel. Sprays flames when triggered.
flare.desc: Light up the night sky with this brand new red flare!
flashlight.held.name: Flashlight
fleshgatherdesc: Speed at gathering from corpses, red indicates fraction destroyed.
floor.grill.desc: A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.
floor.ladder.hatch.desc: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.
floor.triangle.grill.desc: A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.
floor.triangle.ladder.hatch.desc: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.
floor_desc: A deck, or ceilin', dependin' on whar ye're standin'
floor_frame_desc: A frame that lets you attach various blocks into
floor_triangle_frame_desc: A frame that lets you attach various triangle shaped blocks into
fluid.switch.desc: A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via angry pixies. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.
fluidcombiner.desc: Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.
fluidsplitter.desc: Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.
fogmachine.desc: A fog machine that runs on low quality fuel. Can be set to fill an area with thick fog or trigger motion.
foundation_steps_desc: Attaches to foundations or placed on top of floors, allows the player to move from one level to another with ease
free_crate_desc: Untie the crate allowing it to be free
frogboots.steam.desc: An award for those who played Rust during Early Access, thank you.
frogboots.steam.name: Water Creature Boots
full_desc: too much booty for the hold!
fun.bass.desc: Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.
fun.boomboxportable.desc: A portable Boom Box that can play tapes and internet audio streams. [attack] to start/stop and [attack2] to modify settings.
fun.casetterecorder.desc: Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.
fun.cowbell.desc: A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.
fun.flute.desc: A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.
fun.guitar.desc: A classic acoustic guitar, built for jam sessions around campfires at night.
fun.jerrycanguitar.desc: Play yer' Darkwolf like he plays with yer' feelings.
fun.tambourine.desc: A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.
fun.trumpet.desc: Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.
furnace.desc: A Furnace. Use it to smelt mined ore.
furnace.large.desc: Used to smelt large quantities of ore. Difficult to secure, must be placed on terrain.
furnace_help_off: The furnace is off. To switch it on make sure it has fuel (wood) and press the button on the left.
furnace_help_on: This furnace is on. It will burn fuel until it runs out or is switched off. Put ore inside to extract whatever they're holding.
fuse.desc: An unreliable electric fuse. Will allow electrical passthrough for a period of time.
fuse.name: AA Battery
fuselengthdesc: How long until the explosive detonates
gametip_breakcarlock: Get the cockpit's health down to [+lockBreakHealthPercent] or less to allow breaking the car's lock
gametip_comfortregen: You will regenerate a portion of your health when comfortable and not hungry or thirsty.
gametip_consumefood: You can heal, and eliminate thirst and hunger by consuming food items.
gametip_equiptorch: Equip your torch [slot2] and press [attack2] to ignite it
gametip_examineheld: Press [inventory.examineheld] to examine your held item
gametip_fillcupboard: Add more resources to your Tool Cupboard to prevent your base from decaying
gametip_fishingangle: Be sure to keep the fish in front of you at all times.
gametip_fishinginput: Use [+left]/[+right] to pull the fish left/right and [+backward] to reel it in.
gametip_fishinglure: Equip some food as a lure to use the fishing rod
gametip_fishingstrain: Your rod will start shaking if the line is too strained.
gametip_healatcampfire: You can heal by standing next to a lit campfire.
gametip_howtobuildoptions: Hold [attack2] to select different building blocks
gametip_howtohammerUpgrade: Aim at a building block and hold [attack2] to select different upgrades
gametip_howtoretrievethrow: You can retrieve thrown objects by approaching them and pressing [+use]
gametip_howtothrow: Press [attack] to strike. Throw by holding [attack2] to wind up, and [attack] to release.
gametip_howtouseBow: Hold [attack2] to aim. Press [attack] to fire
gametip_howtouseGrenade: Use [attack] to throw or [attack2] to drop the grenade at your feet
gametip_howtousewave: Hold [+gestures] and select "Wave" to show your name to other players
gametip_instrumentfullkeyboard: Press reload [+reload] to switch to full keyboard mode
gametip_instrumentnumlock: Turn numlock on to play this instrument
gametip_instrumentplay: You can play instruments with the numpad buttons
gametip_KayakPaddle: Equip a Paddle to control the Kayak
gametip_nobuild: Yer can't make your ship this close to other ships, objects or forts.
gametip_opencrafting: Press [inventory.togglecrafting] t' open th' CRAFTING MENU
gametip_openinventory: Press [inventory.toggle] t' open th' INVENTORY MENU
gametip_oreminigame: Hit the bright areas of the ore node to harvest it faster.
gametip_placebag: Craft and place a Sleeping Bag to create a respawn point.
gametip_placecupboard: Create a Tool Cupboard to prevent your base from decaying
gametip_pokerwinnings: Don't forget to take your winnings!
gametip_radiation: You are being exposed to lethal levels of radiation. Wear heavier clothing to protect yourself.
gametip_removeradiation: You can reduce radiation levels by swimming, or consuming certain foods
gametip_SledPlacement: Place the sled on snowy ground
gametip_SleepingBagPlacement: Placing a sleeping bag here will trigger the cooldown on a nearby sleeping bag
gametip_toocold: You are very cold. Wear heavier clothing or light a campfire.
gametip_toohot: You are extremely hot. Wear lighter clothing or use water to cool down.
gametip_treeminigame: Hit the red X mark to harvest the tree faster
gametip_voice: Press [+voice] to voice chat to other players
gametip_worlddrink: Approach the water and press [+use] to drink
gates.external.high.stone.desc: A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
gates.external.high.wood.desc: A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
gears.desc: A selection of gears. Some functional, some not.
gears.name: Cogs
geiger.counter.desc: Measures how much sick is in the air
geiger.counter.name: Ticky Thing

genesdesc:
<color=green>G</color> - Growth Speed.
<color=green>Y</color> - Yield.
<color=green>H</color> - Hardiness.
<color=red>W</color> - Water Requirement.
<color=red>X</color> - Empty.
ghostsheet.desc: Definitely not a last minute costume idea.
giantcandycanedecor.desc: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative inflated giant candy cane

giantlollipops.name: Giant Lollipop Decor

guntrap.name: Blunderbuss Snare
hack_desc: Begin attempting to break the code
half_wall_desc: Half the height of a normal wall

halloween.candy.name: Halloween Candy

halloween.lootbag.small.name: Small Loot Bag

halloween.surgeonsuit.name: Johnny Sins' Robe

harvestsDesc: After harvesting, the plant will grow again this many times

hat.bunnyhat.itemdesc: A silly Bunny Hat with wobbly ears to celebrate Easter 2021

hazmatsuit.scientist.peacekeeper.name: Scientist Suit

help_player_desc: Stop this player from dying by helping them to their feet

hobobarrel.name: Hobo Barrel

horse.armor.roadsign.name: Roadsign Horse Armor

horse.armor.wood.name: Wooden Horse Armor

horse.saddlebag.name: Saddle bag

horse.shoes.basic.name: Basic Horse Shoes

horseprotection_desc: How much incoming damage is reduced for the horse

hostilewarn: YE BE A TRAITOR - YE LIFE BE ENDINL'
How much damage is reduced for the rider: Defense against muskets and spiky sticks
hq.metal.ore.desc: A rock holding shiny metal! Heat fer great bounty.
humanmeat.burned.desc: Burned Flesh from a pirate. Consuming will damage your health, you scalawag.
humanmeat.cooked.desc: Salty flesh o' a Pirate eatin' this will stop yer belly growlin' 'n repair yer body some but make ye feel somethin' thirsty. Maybe ye should look fer some better grub.
humanmeat.raw.desc: Raw Pirate Flesh. Eatin' will damage your health and pirate reputation.
humanmeat.spoiled.desc: Spoiled Pirate Flesh. Consuming will damage ye health.
id_hint: Anyone can access any camera if they have the identifier, use a unique name!
ignite_desc: Light th' candle so th' hat emits light. Th' item gunna consume fuel 'n gunna eventually break.
innertube.desc: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.
insufficient_power_desc: Needs more angry pixies to use
inventory.monitor.desc: The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard and Large Storage Box to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.
inventory_playermodel_enabled: Toggle the inventory screen player model preview.
inventory_warning:
CRAFTING IS A ONE WAY THING. 

IF YOU BREAK DOWN AN ITEM YOU WANTED TO KEEP, 
WE CAN'T HELP YOU, EVEN IF IT WAS AN ACCIDENT.

IF YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND THIS 
THEN PLEASE DON'T USE THIS SECTION.
invite_team_sesc: Invite this pirate to your crew
item_desc_urban_shirt_gmod: A blue tshirt featuring the logo of a sandbox based video game which was extremely popular in the early 21st century, before the changes.
jacket.desertcamo.desc: A jacket with a desert camo pattern
jacket.hunter.desc: A jacket with a forest camo pattern
jacket.multicam.desc: A jacket with a multicam pattern
jacket.snow.desc: A thick, high visibility Jacket. It will help keep you warm in any climate.
jacket.snowcamo.desc: A jacket with a snow camouflage pattern
jacket.urbancamo.desc: A jacket with an urban camoflague pattern
jackhammer.desc: An Automatic Hammer to blast through ore nodes. The sheer power of this hammer requires no aiming for the pirate as all shite spots will be instantly shipwrecked. Works well on pirate flesh. Can be refilled at a Workbench.
jackhammer.name: Automatic Hammer
jackolantern.angry.desc: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
jackolantern.happy.desc: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
jar.pickle.desc: Cucumbers in a vinegar bath, jarred by an amatuer. Eat at your own risk.
junkyardcrane.return: Return to the Junkyard. Excessive damage will occur.
kayak.desc: Very small ship. No sails here, just a paddle.
key_id_tooltip: A key will work in a lock if the ID matches
keycard.blue.desc: A key to the Captain's booty.
keycard.blue.name: Captain's Key
keycard.green.desc: A key to the Commander's booty.
keycard.green.name: Commanders key
keycard.red.desc: A key to the Admirals booty.
keycard.red.name: Admiral's key
keylock_create_key: Craft a key for this lock to allow friends to enter
knife.bone.desc: Melee weapon crafted from bone fragments. Good for harvesting carcases.
knife.butcher.desc: A sharp butcher knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh from both dead or alive bodies.
knife.combat.desc: Metal Shiv designed for close combat engagements, can attack while making haste. Best in class at harvesting flesh.
knock_door_desc: Knock t' door to see if anyone's aboard
label: Label
ladder_hatch_desc: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder
ladder_hatch_triangle_desc: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder
lantern.desc: A Lantern. Place it where you need light, requires low grade fuel to work.
largemedkit.desc: A box filled with rum to heal your inside and outside wounds
laserdetector.desc: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam
learn_blueprint_desc: Study this blueprint and permanently learn how to craft the item. This blueprint is destroyed in the process
leather.desc: Leather from an animal. Used in many clothing items and more.
lethaldmgdesc: Damage dealt to soft targets e.g. humans and animals.
light_campfire_desc: Set ye firepit on fire. 'tis gunna cook any grub within.
light_mode_fade_desc: A slow fade, in and out
light_mode_slowglow_desc: Randomly and slowly fade out different bulbs
lightstring.desc: A 3m long string of lights you can use to decorate your home
lightstring.name: Christmas Lights
limit_flashing_tooltip: Limits the flashing frequency of music driven lights
lmg.m249.desc: 100 musketballs to slay all the pirates in Ye' Way
lock.code.desc: A beepy bootyblocker, lock up yar treasure wit a code.
lock.key.desc:
Place on a door to avoid any unwelcome guests. To craft your key first place the lock on a door and hold E while looking at the Key lock and select 'Create Key', a key will now be added to your crafting queue.

If the key is lost, you cannot make another, so don't forget to make extras and put them in a safe place!
lock_spinning_desc: Only players with Building Privilege can spin the wheel
locker.desc: A locker for keeping ye garments and armor safe!
longsword.desc: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with good range and high damage.
loot_player_desc: Access 'tis landlubber's booty. Pillage 'em or dress 'em up all pretty.
low_wall_desc: One third th' height o' normal wall
lowgradefuel.desc: Low Grade Fuel, used to power light sources.
mace.desc: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon, It's unique design makes it easier to hit your target when compared to other more traditional weapons.
machete.desc: A brutal weapon with good range.
mailbox.desc: A box fow shuving ye letters in
mailbox_submit_help: Press this button to submit the contents. You cannot undo this.
map.desc:
Helps you figure out where you are. You can annotate the map by right-clicking and drawing on it.


Drag the map into your belt bar to make it active. You will then be able to view the map by holding down the map button (G by default).
market.inventory_full: Inventory is full. Please take your items.
market.marker.delivery_drone: A delivery drone that is fulfilling your order.
market.tip.click_on_shop: Click on a vending machine to place an order for delivery.
mask.bandana: A square of cloth which is tied around the face over the nose and mouth.
maxconditiondesc: Full HP value for this part
maxhealth.tea.advanced.desc: A tea that increases your maximum health.
maxhealth.tea.desc: A tea that increases your maximum health.
maxteamsizetip: Your team is full. Remove a member to invite another player.
meat.pork.burned.desc: This little piggy has been in the oven for too long.
meat.pork.cooked.desc: Cooked pork, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
meat.pork.desc: Raw pork. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
megaphone.desc: A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.
meleedesc: Protection against melee and stabbing weapons
meleerangedesc: How far an attack reaches with this weapon, in metres
menutip_accuracy: Standing still or crouching while shooting increases accuracy.
menutip_bag: Don't forget to create a sleeping bag! You can pick which one to respawn at on the death screen.
menutip_baggive: You can give a sleeping bag to a steam friend.
menutip_buildwarnmonument: Constructing Homes near castles may bring raiders and pillagers to yee.
menutip_canmelt: You can melt Empty Cans in a campfire to receive Metal Fragments.
menutip_cookmeat: Cook meat in a campfire to increase its healing abilities.
menutip_craftingqueue: You can move crafting items to the front of the crafting queue by right clicking on the item in the crafting queue
menutip_crashharvest: You can harvest metal from helicopter and apc crash sites.
menutip_crouchwalk: Crouching allows you to move silently.
menutip_divesite: Floating Bottles on the seven seas show booty. Dive down and you shall find the booty.
menutip_gestures: Cheer on your friends by pressing [+gestures] to open the gesture menu
menutip_hammerpickup: You can use the Hammer tool to pick up objects. Providing they are unlocked and/or opened.
menutip_hammerrepair: Hit yer ship with this to unshipwreck it.
menutip_humanmeat: Pirate Flesh will make yer salty
menutip_inputsplit: You can split items by the exact amount by right clicking the split bar
menutip_lakeriverdrink: You can drink from lakes and rivers to recover a portion of your health.
menutip_oretip: Stone and Ore Nodes are most commonly found around cliffs, mountains and other rock formations.
menutip_quickcraftmulti: [Middle Mouse] an item in quick craft menu will add 5x to your crafting queue
menutip_radwash: Submerge yourself in water and slosh around to remove radiation
menutip_removeitemquickcraft: Ye can cancel ye crafts by right clicking in the fast buildin' menu
menutip_repairblocked: You cannot repair or upgrade building parts for 30 seconds after they've been damaged.
menutip_report: If you wish to report any in-game issues try pressing F7
menutip_riverplants: Edible plants are commonly found on river sides.
menutip_rotatedeployables: Rotate deployables before placing them by pressing [R]
menutip_seedsun: Ensure seeds are placed in full sunlight for faster growth.
menutip_sneakanimal: Some animals have blind spots. Sneak up from behind to get close enough to make the kill.
menutip_stacksplit: You can split a stack of items in half by holding [Middle Mouse] and dragging
menutip_switchammo: Switch between ammo types by holding the [+reload] key
menutip_thirdsplit: You can split stacks of items into a third by holding Shift and [Middle Mouse] dragging
menutip_upkeepwarning: The larger you expand your base the more it'll cost to upkeep
menutip_vending: Sell your unwanted items safely by crafting a vending machine.
message.reportban: "<color=#fff>{0}</color>" was banned with the help of a report you made on <color=#fff>{1}</color> - thank you!
metal.facemask.desc: Taliban mask will save you from the non-believers!
metal.fragments.desc: Shiny stuff. Melted in de big melty oven from Ore ta make new things.
metal.ore.desc: A naturally occurring rock containing metal and metal compounds. You can extract this metal using a furnace.
metal.plate.torso.desc: A metal plate covering your torso, provides excellent protection from all forms of attacks.
metal.refined.desc: High quality metal suitable for armor and weapons construction.
metal_ugrade_desc: Sheet metal is twice as strong as stone
metalblade.desc: A Metal Blade for making melee weapons.
metalblade.name: Metal Blade
metalpipe.name: Iron Pipe

spear.wooden.desc: Primitive weapon, perfect for hunting your foes. Can be upgraded to Stone Spear.
speargun.desc: A speargun which can be fired underwater
spiderweb.desc: Giant Cobwebs which can be hung against both a ceiling and a wall.
spiderweb.name: Spider Webs
splitter.desc: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.
spookyspeaker.desc: Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!
spreaddesc: How far off from the fired trajectory the projectile may deviate
stables_buysaddle: Sure, Just purchase a saddle and head over to the stables and claim the steed of your liking! Don't forget to examine the horse before you decide to make sure you like him!
stables_buysaddle_ok: Okay, Let me see what you've got!
stables_intro_wanthorse: I'd like to buy a horse
stablesintro: Ahoy! What are you looking for mate?
stairs_desc: Stairs that go up in spiral over half block height
stairs_lshape_desc: Stairs that are an L shape
stash.small.desc: A hidden, burried stash to keep your items safe. After placing, return to the stash and aim at the ground where you hid it and it will reveal itself.
steaminventory.bag.high.desc: Bags contain clothes. This is a high quality bag, which means the clothes in this bag are higher quality than in the low quality bag.
steaminventory.bag.low.desc: Bags contain clothes. This is a low quality bag - which means the skins contained within are worth less than in other bags.
steaminventory.barrel.desc: Barrels contain skins for weapons and tools. Anything that the player holds.
steaminventory.box.high.desc: Boxes contain deployables, such as sleeping bags and crates.
steaminventory.cloth.desc: Cloth can be combined to craft new clothing items.
steaminventory.metal.desc: Metal can be combined to craft new weapon items.
This special crate acquired from a twitch drop during Trust in Rust 3 will yield a random skin
steaminventory.wood.desc: Wood can be combined to craft new skins and items
sticks.name: Sticks
stocking.large.desc: A SUPER Stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get an awesome gift!
stocking.large.name: SUPER Stocking
stocking.small.desc: A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking.
stocking.small.name: Small Stocking
stone.pickaxe.desc: Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.
stonehatchet.desc: Primitive tool used for harvesting wood from trees and logs.
stones.desc: Harvested from rocks using tools, basic building material.
strobelight.desc: A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.
submarine.torpedo.rising.desc: A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead while rising to the water's surface.
submarine.torpedo.straight.desc: A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead in a straight line.
sulfur.desc: Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.
sulfur.ore.desc: A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.
sunglasses.desc: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
sunglasses.name: Sunglasses
supply.signal.desc: Purple signal smoke. Use to mark a location for an airdrop.
surveycharge.desc: Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.
switch_on_desc: Light the torch so the hat emits light. The item will consume fuel and will eventually break.
syringe.medical.desc: Heal ye' self or other pirates with this syringe. Left-Click heals ye' self, right-click heals a pirate. Technology pioneer'd by ye' BeardedVillain.
table.desc: Every home needs a table. A decorative item which provides comfort when in close proximity.
tactical.gloves.desc: Military issue tactical gloves provide protection as well as weapon stabilization leading to higher accuracy when used.
target.reactive.desc: A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.
targeting.computer.desc: Used by the captain to play Rust
tarp.name: Tarp
teachparts.name: Witches trash
team.invited: {0} has invited you to join a team
techparts.desc: A gaggle of boards n' wires used in black magic.
telephone.desc: Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!
telephone_makecall_desc: Dial a number or a contact
tocraft: You can also press {%inventory.togglecrafting} to switch to crafting
toggle_hatch_desc: Open or Close the deck hatch
tool.binoculars.desc: Binoculars allowing you to see objects at great length.
tool.binoculars.name: Binoculars
tool.camera.desc: A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.
tool.instant_camera.desc: An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload.
toolgun.desc: Celebrating 15 Years of Garry's Mod! Use this tool gun to upgrade building parts. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.
toolgun.name: Garry's Mod Tool Gun
toolgun.steam.desc: A special gift to owners of Garry's Mod. Celebrating 15 years!
toolgun.steam.name: Garry's Mod Tool Gun
tooltip.af: Makes textures sharper when viewed at an angle or distance. Large performance impact.
tooltip.antialiasing: Smoothes jagged edges of the scene
tooltip.ao: Makes crevices darker, giving the scene more depth
tooltip.bloom: Makes bright lights appear to glow realistically
tooltip.branding: Show or hide the green banner on the top right of your screen
tooltip.compass: Controls visiblity of the ingame compass
tooltip.contactshadows: Adds contact shadows to improve shadow detail on view model, players and any areas that may otherwise be missed by shadow maps.
tooltip.culling: Enables hiding of objects behind walls. Disable if you notice any lag or frame rate drops while rotating the camera.
tooltip.dof: Make stuff in the distance blurry. Looks cool, adds nothing.
tooltip.flipy: Inverts what moving the mouse up and down does
tooltip.gibsmax: Maximum amount of gibs (broken objects) that can exist at one time
tooltip.grassdisplace: Displaces grass when walking over it
tooltip.grassshadows: Enables shadow casting on grass blades.
tooltip.inventory-swap-key: You can also press {%inventory.toggle} to switch to inventory
tooltip.midiinput: Enable to play Instruments with connected MIDI devices.
tooltip.parallax: Gives textures the illusion of depth and geometry. High performance impact.
tooltip.playernames: Show or hide the player names that float above their heads
tooltip.pushtotalk: If disabled your mic will be broadcast all the time, instead of when you press the chat button
tooltip.reflex: Enable NVIDIA Reflex. Dynamically reduces system latency.
tooltip.shadowcascades: Number of distance splits for sun and moon shadows. Fewer cascades mean more performance and lower quality.
tooltip.sustainInput: Enable to allow sustain pedal input from MIDI devices while playing instruments
tooltip.vignet: Darkens the corners of the screen (no performance hit)
toptier_upgrade_desc: Strongest class of material, 4x as strong as stone.
torch.desc: A Torch. Lights your way at night and can be used as a weapon.
translation_source: Translations are provided by the community so there may be mistakes. If you would like to help us translate please join in at translate.playrust.com
trap.bear.desc: A metal trap that can injure or even kill people when stepped on. Can be picked up after been triggered.
trap.landmine.desc: An old military Landmine. If you stand on one, you can ask a friend to disarm it before it explodes.
treegatherdesc: Speed at gathering Wood, red indicates fraction destroyed.
troutsmall.desc: A Small Trout. Good for a few meals.
tshirt.desc: A t-shirt with very short sleeves.
tshirt.flag.germany.desc: Sometimes you're feeling a bit German and want everyone to know all about it
tshirt.flag.russia.desc: Speaking Russian in the chat and making Russian flags isn't enough. Make sure everyone knows you're from Russia by wearing this shirt.
tshirt.long.black.desc: Made popular by catburglers, french mimes and goths - this longsleeveed t-shirt features a stunning lack of color.
tshirt.long.grey.desc: Embrace the feeling that your life is relatively insignificant with this grey longsleeved tshirt.
tshirt.long.orange.desc: This is like a normal tshirt, but it has sleeves that extend to your wrists.
tshirt.long.yellow.desc: Like being noticed immediately from 200 feet away? Give this yellow long sleeved tshirt a try!
tshirt_black_desc: A black tshirt. It's slightly worn, slightly sweaty, slightly smelly.
tshirt_blue_desc: A blue tshirt. It's slightly worn, slightly sweaty, slightly smelly.
tshirt_forestcamo_desc: Perfect for when you're hiding in a forest but want to look cool when you get caught
tshirt_red_desc: A red tshirt. It's slightly worn, slightly sweaty, slightly smelly.
tshirt_urbancamo_desc: In a city? Want people to think your torso is invisible? This is the shirt for you!
turn_off_desc: Turn off the hat. Stop emitting light and stop using fuel.
turret_attackall_desc: Target all ye pirates who be not authorized
turret_peacekeeper_desc: Starts Peacekeeping and only targets armed or angry scallywags
twitchsunglasses.desc: Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.
twitchsunglasses.name: Purple Sunglasses
twitchunderwear.name: Purple Underwear
unlock_spinning_desc: Allow Anyone to spin the wheel
unreliabledesc: This explosive device has a chance of failing to detonate. If this happens you may retrieve it and try again.
upgrade_stone_desc: A strong material. Impervious to fire and melee damage.
upkeep_info: Maintain the required amount of resources to prevent your base from decaying over time. Bases left unattended without enough upkeep resources will be destroyed.
usebench_desc: Open your crafting window and use this bench
uselight_desc: Control the aim direction of the light
valve1.desc: Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
valve1.name: Low Quality Valves
valve2.desc: Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
valve2.name: Medium Quality Valves
valve3.desc: High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
valve3.name: High Quality Valves
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.armored.desc: Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.desc: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.with.engine.desc: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.
vehicle.1mod.passengers.armored.desc: Single module armored seating for two passengers.
vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.desc: Single module seating for two passengers.
vehicle.1mod.taxi.desc: Single module seating for two passengers, with protection at the front.
vehicleediting_badoccupant: The vehicle on the lift is not in an editable state.
vehicleediting_info: Drag vehicle modules to and from the sockets to edit the vehicle. Select a module or chassis to repair it.
vehicleediting_nooccupant: No vehicle on the vehicle lift.
vehicleediting_notdriveable: Vehicle needs at least an engine and a driver's seat to leave the garage.
velocitydesc: How much this modification affects the velocity of projectiles fired from the weapon it is attached to
vending.machine.desc:
Trade your goods with other players safely by creating sell and buy orders.  

If a raider gains access to the rear panel, they will have free reign over all of your goodies. Keep it safe.
wall.external.high.desc: Spiked timber wall to keep scallywags away!
wall.external.high.ice.desc: A very high ice wall to protect your property.
wall.external.high.stone.desc: A wall of stone and metal thorns to keep scallywags away!
wall.frame.cell.gate.desc: Wall of cold metal bars with a lock.
wall.frame.garagedoor.desc: A garage door that rolls up and down.
wall.frame.shopfront.desc: A shop front to do commerce.
wall.frame.shopfrontmetal.desc: Blunderbuss stopping store front for safe commerce.
wall.ice.wall.desc: A short wall made of solid ice.
wall.window.bars.metal.desc: Metal window bars made to fit a normal sized window.
wall.window.bars.toptier.desc: Window bars to fit a standard window. These bars are made out of reinforced metal and contain a thick surround to protect from incoming projectiles.
wall.window.bars.wood.desc: Window bars made out 'o wood. They'll stop people climbin' through ye window, but probably not fer extra long.
wall_desc: Secure your base by enclosing it in walls
wall_frame_desc: A frame that lets you attach various blocks into
watchtower.wood.desc: A high wooden watchtower with a ladder
watchtower.wood.name: Watch Tower
water.barrel.desc: A storage container for water. Can output 10ml of water a second via a hose.
water.catcher.large.desc: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
water.catcher.small.desc: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
water.desc: Rum. Drinkin' will halt yer thirst.
water.purifier.desc: A rum purifier. Place over-top 'o a campfire. Gunna provide spit shine, potable rum from salty, or stagnant rum 'n wit' rum we mean water.
water.salt.desc: Rum with a high alcohol content, Drinkin will hurt you.
watercatcher_help: Water catchers periodically gather water from t' environment.
waterjug.desc: A large jerry can for water.
waterpump.desc: Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entites.
weapon.mod.8x.scope.desc: See 16x further with this telescope on a weapon!
weapon.mod.flashlight.desc: Stick it on a musket so you don't need to shoot to light up your ship. Press F to turn it on
weapon.mod.holosight.desc: Uses black magic to show you where ye musket balls will go.
weapon.mod.lasersight.desc: Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a guiding laser and reduces weapon sway.
weapon.mod.muzzleboost.desc: Increases weapon fire rate by channeling gasses back into the weapon cycling it faster, at the cost of bullet velocity and accuracy.
weapon.mod.muzzlebrake.desc: Lowers recoil felt by the operator but can make bullet path more unpredictable and dealing slightly less damage to your foes.
weapon.mod.silencer.desc: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.
weapon.mod.simplesight.desc: A poorly made sight, slightly better than iron sights.
weapon.mod.small.scope.desc: See 8x further with this telescope on a weapon!
weaponwarn: Put yer gun away or be thrown overboard
window_bars_desc: These really shouldn't be on 'tis menu
window_desc: An opening in a wall, perfect for placing windows bars in
winnings_desc: ensure ye grab your spoils before leaving!
wiretool.name: Wire Tool
wolfmeat.burned.desc: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
wolfmeat.cooked.desc: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
wolfmeat.raw.desc: Raw Wolf Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
wolfmeat.spoiled.desc: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
wood.armor.jacket.desc: A shoddy piece of body armor made from Wood and rope.
wood.armor.pants.desc: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Wood and rope.
wood.desc: Wood. Collected from trees and used in many crafting recipes. It's also needed to cook in camp-fires.
wood.helmet.pants.desc: A shoddy helmet made from Wood and Cloth.
wood.tea.advanced.desc: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.
wood.tea.desc: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.
wood.tea.pure.desc: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.
wood_upgrade_desc: Wood is a medium strength building material but vulnerable to fire
woodcross.desc: A wooden cross marking the remains of an unknown soul
woodcross.name: Wooden Cross
workbench_info: You can use the workbench to experiment using scrap to create a new, previously unknown blueprint.
workbench_resultdesc: The item created from your experiment will appear to the left.
workbench_unlockedall: You have unlocked everything available from this workbench.
workbench1desc: This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 1
workbench2desc: This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 2
workbench3desc: This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 3
workcart.desc: A service train designed to run on an underground rail system.
worm.desc: A small, writhing worm that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.
wrap_gift_desc: Wrap this item and turn it in to an openable gift

ws.browse.texture: Click to browse - to upload a new texture
ws.openlocation: Click to open this file location (if it's on disk)

xmas.decoration.candycanes.desc: Decorative Plastic Candy Canes you can hang on your Christmas tree
xmas.decoration.candycanes.name: Decorative Plastic Candy Canes
xmas.decoration.gingerbreadmen.desc: Decorative Gingerbread Men you can hang on your Christmas tree
xmas.decoration.gingerbreadmen.name: Decorative Gingerbread Men

xmas.decoration.star.name: Star Tree Topper

xmas.lightstring.advanced.name: Deluxe Christmas Lights
xmas.lightstring.advanceddesc: Colored, Animated, Powered Lights. Requires 5 angry pixies. Click to start placement, right click to end. Each unit is 0.5m long.
xmas.lightstring.desc: A string of colored lights to decorate your home
xmas.lightstring.name: Christmas Lights
xmas.present.large.desc: A Large Present, the best there is. Unwrap it now!
xmas.present.large.name: Large Present
xmas.present.medium.desc: A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present.
xmas.present.medium.name: Medium Present

xmas.present.small.name: Small Present

yellowperch.desc: A Yellow Perch, commonly found in freshwater rivers.
you_are_wounded: Ye be sleepen with the fishies soon
you_are_wounded_explanation: Ye gunna die unless ye get help from an lil' sailor soon
